column4: Is there any way I can boot Ubuntu into a minimal-resources command-line mode? The computer it's on is amazing, but I need minimal resources to be used while I run a game server that's command-line operable. Any suggestions?
what gameserver you want to run that needs that much ressources? Maybe, if you just want to run servers, install the server edition?

It's a Minecraft game server-- I want more resources to be dedicated to the server. I understand that I could install a server-edition, but I use the computer as a normal desktop when the server is unnecessary.
ah okay, I think there should be some options for booting but I don't know exactly
